text: "It's not an MVP if it doesn't provide feedback. An MVP should hurt because it's not perfect." - @holly_cummins #devoxx

author.description: @DatadogHQ DevRel, @DevOpsDays core team, Advocate of nuance & cooler takes. Leaving twitter. DMs will be not be read. Hit me up at jason.yee@datadoghq.com
